meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hilarious.
meanings.sent1: The hilarities of the comedy show had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent2: We shared many hilarities during our fun game night.
meanings.sent3: The family reunion was full of hilarities and joy.
meanings.sent4: Her jokes brought a wave of hilarities to the room.
meanings.sent5: The children's play was a whirlwind of giggles and hilarities.

meanings.sent1: The movie was filled with hilarities that kept us entertained.
meanings.sent2: We couldn't stop laughing at the hilarities in the stand-up comedy show.
meanings.sent3: The cat's antics provided endless hilarities for the family.
meanings.sent4: The sitcom is a treasure trove of hilarities that never get old.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's performance was a cascade of side-splitting hilarities.
